DataFlow

A wrapper class for DataFlow operations.

Bases: ComposaPy.mixins.PandasMixin, ComposaPy.api.ComposableApi

A wrapper class for DataFlow operations.

run_status(self, run_id: int)¶

Checks status of a run.

Parameters (int) run_id: id of the run

Return (int) run_id: associated run id

wait_for_run_execution(self, run_id: int) → dict[str, int]¶

Waits until run has finished.

Parameters (int) run_id: id of the run

Return (dict[str, int]) execution_status: status of the execution

import_app_from_json(self, json: str) → int¶

import and save app from a json string of an app.

Parameters (string) json: json string of app.

Return (int) app_id: the id of the app.

run(self, app_id: int, external_inputs: dict[str, any] = None) → Optional[ComposaPy.DataFlow.models.RunSet]¶

Runs a dataflow from the app id.

Parameters (int) id: id of the dataflow (dict[str,any]) external_inputs: any external modules (external int, table, file, etc) that require outside input to run can be added using a dictionary with the module input’s name and corresponding value

Return (int) run_id: associated run id
